Users may need to debug problems relating to vector registers, but DDR/jdmpview does not print them out. e.g.

```> !gpinfo
Failing Thread: !j9vmthread 0x87f00
Failing Thread ID: 0x3131 (12593)
gpInfo:
J9Generic_Signal_Number=00000020 Signal_Number=00000008 Error_Value=00000000 Signal_Code=00000000
Handler1=000003FFFC28E418 Handler2=000003FFFC152878
gpr0=00000000420E0002 gpr1=000000002C86E6B0 gpr2=000000000019E300 gpr3=0000000000000000
gpr4=000003FFE5F9BA02 gpr5=0000000000145818 gpr6=000000002C86E6B0 gpr7=000003FFFCE12568
gpr8=000003FF91019C2B gpr9=000003FF00000001 gpr10=000003FFFCE10808 gpr11=000003FFF5F9E330
gpr12=000003FFF80AA600 gpr13=0000000000087F00 gpr14=000003FFE5F9BA48 gpr15=000003FFFCE10650
psw=000003FFF7B1DD40 mask=0705D00180000000 fpc=0008FE0000000000 bea=000003FFE5F9BA42
fpr0 4045800000000000 (f: 0.000000, d: 4.300000e+01)
fpr1 3ff3400000000000 (f: 0.000000, d: 1.203125e+00)
fpr2 3ff0000000000000 (f: 0.000000, d: 1.000000e+00)
fpr3 4023c728c3233464 (f: 3273864192.000000, d: 9.888983e+00)
fpr4 3ff0000000000000 (f: 0.000000, d: 1.000000e+00)
fpr5 3d6b17339a2945a5 (f: 2586396160.000000, d: 7.699620e-13)
fpr6 3fea98ef606a63be (f: 1617585024.000000, d: 8.311688e-01)
fpr7 4023c728c3233615 (f: 3273864704.000000, d: 9.888983e+00)
fpr8 0000000000000000 (f: 0.000000, d: 0.000000e+00)
fpr9 0000000000000000 (f: 0.000000, d: 0.000000e+00)
fpr10 0000000000000000 (f: 0.000000, d: 0.000000e+00)
fpr11 0000000000000000 (f: 0.000000, d: 0.000000e+00)
fpr12 0000000000000000 (f: 0.000000, d: 0.000000e+00)
fpr13 0000000000000000 (f: 0.000000, d: 0.000000e+00)
fpr14 0000000000000000 (f: 0.000000, d: 0.000000e+00)
fpr15 0000000000000000 (f: 0.000000, d: 0.000000e+00)
Module=/opt/ibm/was/java/8.0/jre/lib/s390x/compressedrefs/libj9jit29.so
Module_base_address=000003FFF70CB000
```
